data.comment: Code review complete. Minor change requested for extra error handling on invalid zip codes.
Commitment: Fix for error handling will be pushed this afternoon.
Scope confirmed: UI should include sections for medical history, insurance info, and personal therapy goals.

Meeting discussion summary: One proposal is to extend the main user database schema for structure and easy querying. The alternative proposal is to use a flexible JSON blob for faster implementation and easier form modifications. A decision has been deferred and needs to be made offline.
This task is blocked pending completion of the Therapist profile data API (86d0cuegn).

data.name: Anika
data.details: Role: QA Engineer. Joining next week to take over manual testing.

data.name: Code Review Feedback Process
data.details: New rule: All code review feedback must be submitted as comments on the GitHub pull request. Feedback via Slack or email is no longer permitted.

data.summary: Ambiguous task reassignment for 'Design the multi-step booking & payment flow' (86d0bjby9).
data.context: The project manager stated they are reassigning task 86d0bjby9 from 'Shrujan' to 'Sujan'. However, the project board already lists 'Sujan H' as the assignee, and 'Shrujan' is not a recognized user in the system with a user ID. The intended action is unclear and requires clarification.
